CustomField.description: This field is required and confirms that the template is active. The active flag checks when within the specified period based on start and end dates.The field is manually populated.
CustomField.formula: IF((LLC_BI__Start_Date__c <= TODAY() && TODAY() <= LLC_BI__End_Date__c) || (LLC_BI__Start_Date__c <= TODAY() && ISBLANK(LLC_BI__End_Date__c)) , TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Is Active
